ED_Title: Global awareness of the tragedies irregular migrants in Mediterranean basin,with specific emphasis on Syrian asylum seekers
ED_DecisionText:
A

At its 75th plenary meeting, on 7 April 2017, the General Assembly, recalling its resolutions 47/4 of 16 October 1992 and 70/296 of 25 July 2016, decided, without setting a precedent, to invite a representative of the International Organization for Migration to make a statement before Member States at that meeting. 

(See A/71/PV.75)

B

At its 75th plenary meeting on 7 April 2017, the General Assembly decided, without setting a precedent, to invite Mr. Volker Türk, the Assistant High Commissioner for Protection in the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, to make a statement at its 75th plenary meeting on 7 April 2017. 

(See A/71/PV.75)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of this decision will be contained in document A/71/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
